$Log: eur.ia_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.2 2010-06-19 19:41:58 gcrane accent errors fixed
Revision 1.1 2009/11/23 18:46:35 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 21:15:27 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:34:18 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.8 2004/04/21 20:27:28 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.7 2003/09/09 18:02:08 amahoney put spaces around em-dash entity so as not to confuse morphology stuff
Revision 1.6 2003/07/01 22:16:11 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.5 2000/03/04 20:34:33 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.4 2000/02/17 15:51:39 amahoney use n attribute on sp to carry over speaker names when long speeches are interrupted by card breaks -- and move card break past close tag of sp
Revision 1.3 2000/01/11 20:40:41 amahoney convert to P3

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: *(ele/nh te: tau/ths oi( ta\ prw=t' w)lbisme/noi
deinai\ d' a)peilai\ kai\ kat' a)llh/lwn fo/nos
cuni/staq', o(/stis mh\ la/boi th\n parqe/non.
to\ pra=gma d' a)po/rws ei)=xe *tunda/rew| patri/,
dou=nai/ te mh\ dou=nai/ te, th=s tu/xhs o(/pws
a(/yait' a)/rista. kai/ nin ei)sh=lqen ta/de:
tou/tw| cunamunei=n, ei)/ tis e)k do/mwn labw\n
oi)/xoito to/n t' e)/xont' a)pwqoi/h le/xous,
e)pei\ d' e)pistw/qhsan — eu)= de/ pws ge/rwn
h(\ d' ei(/leq', o(/s sfe mh/pot' w)/felen labei=n,
*mene/laon. e)lqw\n d' e)k *frugw=n o( ta\s qea\s
kri/nwn o(/d', w(s o( mu=qos *)argei/wn e)/xei,
h(/kousi th=sde, nausi\n a)spi/sin q' o(mou=
i(/ppois te polloi=s a(/rmasi/n t' h)skhme/noi.
a)/llos tis w)/fel' a)nt' e)mou= labei=n to/de.
kai\ plou=n t' e)/sesqai kai\ kataskafa\s *frugw=n
[qu/sasi, mh\ qu/sasi d' ou)k ei)=nai ta/de.]
klu/wn d' e)gw\ tau=t', o)rqi/w| khru/gmati
w(s ou)/pot' a)\n tla\s qugate/ra ktanei=n e)mh/n.
ou(= dh/ m' a)delfo\s pa/nta prosfe/rwn lo/gon
e)/peise tlh=nai deina/. ka)n de/ltou ptuxai=s
gra/yas e)/pemya pro\s da/marta th\n e)mh\n
sumplei=n t' *)axaioi=s ou(/nek' ou) qe/loi le/gwn,
ei) mh\ par' h(mw=n ei)=sin e)s *fqi/an le/xos:
peiqw\ ga\r ei)=xon th/nde pro\s da/mart' e)mh/n,
mo/noi d' *)axaiw=n i)/smen w(s e)/xei ta/de
e)/gnwn to/t', au)=qis metagra/fw kalw=s pa/lin
e)s th/nde de/lton, h(\n kat' eu)fro/nhs skia\n
lu/onta kai\ sundou=nta/ m' ei)sei=des, ge/ron.
a)ll' ei)=a xw/rei ta/sd' e)pistola\s labw\n
pro\s *)/argos. a(\ de\ ke/keuqe de/ltos e)n ptuxai=s,
pisto\s ga\r a)lo/xw| toi=s t' e)moi=s do/moisin ei)=.]

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ti/s pot' a)/r' a)sth\r o(/de porqmeu/ei;

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: ti/ de\ su\ skhnh=s e)kto\s a)i/sseis,

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: tou\s d' e)n timai=s h(=sson zhlw=.

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: kai\ mh\n to\ kalo/n g' e)ntau=qa bi/ou.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: tou=to de/ g' e)sti\n to\ kalo\n sfalero/n,
tote\ me\n ta\ qew=n ou)k o)rqwqe/nt'

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: ou)k e)pi\ pa=si/n s' e)fu/teus' a)gaqoi=s,
dei= de/ se xai/rein kai\ lupei=sqai:
qnhto\s ga\r e)/fus. ka)\n mh\ su\ qe/lh|s,
th/nd' h(\n pro\ xerw=n e)/ti basta/zeis,
ti/ ponei=s; ti/ ne/on peri\ soi/, basileu=;
pro\s <d'> a)/ndr' a)gaqo\n pisto/n te fra/seis:

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: le/ge kai\ sh/main', i(/na kai\ glw/ssh|

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: mh\ ste/llein ta\n sa\n i)=nin pro\s

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: to/de kai\ deino/n: sh/main' o(/ ti fh/|s.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ou)k oi)=de ga/mous, ou)d' o(/ ti pra/ssomen,

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: o(\s tw=| th=s qea=s sh\n pai=d' a)/loxon

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: a)ll' i)/q' e)re/sswn so\n po/da, gh/ra|

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: leu=sse, fula/sswn mh/ ti/s se la/qh|

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: pisto\s de\ fra/sas ta/de pw=s e)/somai,
le/ge, paidi\ se/qen th=| sh=| t' a)lo/xw|;

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: qnhtw=n d' o)/lbios e)s te/los ou)dei\s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: *phlei/+das su\n o(/ploisi par' a)/ntuga kai\ su/-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: decio\n ke/ras † pro\s to\ laio\n cuna=ge †,
ta\ de\ kat' oi)/kous klu/ousa sugklh/tou

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: *mene/lae, tolma=|s dei/n', a(/ s' ou) tolma=n xrew/n.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: klai/ois a)/n, ei) pra/ssois a(\ mh\ pra/ssein se dei=.

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: ou) xrh=n se lu=sai de/lton, h(\n e)gw\ 'feron.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: ou)de/ ge fe/rein se\ pa=sin *(/ellhsin kaka/.

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: a)/llois a(millw= tau=t': a)/fes de\ th/nd' e)moi/.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: skh/ptrw| ta/x' a)=ra so\n kaqaima/cw ka/ra.

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: a)ll' eu)klee/s toi despotw=n qnh/|skein u(/per.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: me/qes: makrou\s de\ dou=los w)\n le/geis lo/gous.

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths
sp.l: w)= de/spot', a)dikou/mesqa. sa\s d' e)pistola\s
e)carpa/sas o(/d' e)k xerw=n e)mw=n bi/a|,

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ti/s pot' e)n pu/laisi qo/rubos kai\ lo/gwn a)kosmi/a;

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: ou(mo\s ou)x o( tou=de mu=qos kuriw/teros le/gein.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: su\ de\ ti/ tw=|d' e)s e)/rin a)fi=cai, *mene/lews, bi/a| t' a)/geis;

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: ble/yon ei)s h(ma=s, i(/n' a)rxa\s tw=n lo/gwn tau/tas la/bw.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: mw=n tre/sas ou)k a)nakalu/yw ble/faron, *)atre/ws gegw/s;

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: th/nd' o(ra=|s de/lton, kaki/stwn gramma/twn u(phre/tin;

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ei)sorw=: kai\ prw=ta tau/thn sw=n a)pa/llacon xerw=n.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: ou)/, pri\n a)\n dei/cw ge *danaoi=s pa=si ta)ggegramme/na.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: h)= ga\r oi)=sq' a(\ mh/ se kairo\s ei)de/nai sh/mantr' a)nei/s;

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: w(/ste s' a)lgu=nai/ g', a)noi/cas a(\ su\ ka/k' ei)rga/sw la/qra|.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: pou= de\ ka)/labe/s nin; w)= qeoi/, sh=s a)naisxu/ntou freno/s.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: prosdokw=n sh\n pai=d' a)p' *)/argous, ei) stra/teum' a)fi/cetai.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ti/ de/ se ta)ma\ dei= fula/ssein; ou)k a)naisxu/ntou to/de;

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: o(/ti to\ bou/lesqai/ m' e)/knize: so\s de\ dou=los ou)k e)/fun.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ou)xi\ deina/; to\n e)mo\n oi)kei=n oi)=kon ou)k e)a/somai;

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: pla/gia ga\r fronei=s, ta\ me\n nu=n, ta\ de\ pa/lai, ta\ d' au)ti/ka.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: eu)= keko/myeusai ponhra/: glw=ss' e)pi/fqonon sofh/.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: nou=s de/ g' ou) be/baios a)/dikon kth=ma kou) safe\s fi/lois.
bou/lomai de/ s' e)cele/gcai, kai\ su\ mh/t' o)rgh=s u(/po
a)potre/pou ta)lhqe\s ou)/t' au)= katatenw= li/an e)gw/.
tw=| dokei=n me\n ou)xi\ xrh/|zwn, tw=| de\ bou/lesqai qe/lwn,
w(s tapeino\s h)=sqa, pa/shs decia=s prosqigga/nwn
kai\ qu/ras e)/xwn a)klh/|stous tw=| qe/lonti dhmotw=n
kai\ didou\s pro/srhsin e(ch=s pa=si — kei) mh/ tis qe/loi —
toi=s tro/pois zhtw=n pri/asqai to\ filo/timon e)k me/sou;
ka)=|t', e)pei\ kate/sxes a)rxa/s, metabalw\n a)/llous tro/pous
toi=s fi/loisin ou)ke/t' h)=sqa toi=s pri\n w(s pro/sqen fi/los,
duspro/sitos e)/sw te klh/|qrwn spa/nios. a)/ndra d' ou) xrew\n
to\n a)gaqo\n pra/ssonta mega/la tou\s tro/pous meqista/nai,
a)lla\ kai\ be/baion ei)=nai to/te ma/lista toi=s fi/lois,
h(ni/k' w)felei=n ma/lista dunato/s e)stin eu)tuxw=n.
tau=ta me/n se prw=t' e)ph=lqon, i(/na se prw=q' hu(=ron kako/n.
w(s d' e)s *au)=lin h)=lqes au)=qis xw( *panellh/nwn strato/s,
ou)de\n h)=sq', a)ll' e)ceplh/ssou th=| tu/xh| th=| tw=n qew=n,
nau=s dih/ggellon, ma/thn de\ mh\ ponei=n e)n *au)li/di.
w(s a)/nolbon ei)=xes o)/mma su/gxusi/n t', ei) mh\ new=n
xili/wn a)/rxwn to\ *pria/mou pedi/on e)mplh/seis doro/s.
ka)me\ pareka/leis: *ti/ dra/sw; ti/na de\ po/ron eu(/rw po/qen; —
w(/ste mh\ stere/nta s' a)rxh=s a)pole/sai kalo\n kle/os.
ka)=|t', e)pei\ *ka/lxas e)n i(eroi=s ei)=pe sh\n qu=sai ko/rhn
a)/smenos qu/sein u(pe/sths pai=da: kai\ pe/mpeis e(kw/n,
ou) bi/a| — mh\ tou=to le/ch|s — sh=| da/marti, pai=da sh\n
ka)=|q' u(postre/yas le/lhyai metabalw\n a)/llas grafa/s,
w(s foneu\s ou)ke/ti qugatro\s sh=s e)/sh|. ma/lista/ ge.
ou(=tos au(to/s e)stin ai)qh\r o(\s ta/d' h)/kousen se/qen.
muri/oi de/ toi pepo/nqas' au)to/: pro\s ta\ pra/gmata
e)kponou=s' e)/xontes, ei)=ta d' e)cexw/rhsan kakw=s,
ta\ me\n u(po\ gnw/mhs politw=n a)sune/tou, ta\ d' e)ndi/kws
h(/, qe/lousa dra=n ti kedno/n, barba/rous tou\s ou)de/nas
katagelw=ntas e)canh/sei dia\ se\ kai\ th\n sh\n ko/rhn.
mhde/n' a)ndrei/as e(/kati prosta/thn qei/mhn xqono/s,
mhd' o(/plwn a)/rxonta: nou=n xrh\ to\n strathla/thn e)/xein:
po/leos w(s a)/rxwn a)nh\r pa=s, cu/nesin h)\n e)/xwn tu/xh|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ma/xas q', o(/tan pot' e)mpe/swsin ei)s e)/rin.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: bou/lomai/ s' ei)pei=n kakw=s eu)=, braxe/a, mh\ li/an a)/nw
ble/fara pro\s ta)naide\s a)gagw/n, a)lla\ swfroneste/rws,
w(s a)delfo\n o)/nt': a)nh\r ga\r xrhsto\s ai)dei=sqai filei=.
ei)pe/ moi, ti/ deina\ fusa=|s ai(mathro\n o)/mm' e)/xwn;
ti/s a)dikei= se; tou= ke/xrhsai; xrhsta\ le/ktr' e)ra=|s labei=n;
ou)k e)/xoim' a)/n soi parasxei=n: w(=n ga\r e)kth/sw, kakw=s
h)=rxes. ei)=t' e)gw\ di/khn dw= sw=n kakw=n, o( mh\ sfalei/s;
ou) da/knei se to\ filo/timon tou)mo/n, a)ll' e)n a)gka/lais
eu)preph= gunai=ka xrh/|zeis, to\ lelogisme/non parei\s
kai\ to\ kalo/n, e)/xein. ponhrou= fwto\s h(donai\ kakai/.
ei) d' e)gw/, gnou\s pro/sqen ou)k eu)=, metete/qhn eu)bouli/a|,
mai/nomai; su\ ma=llon, o(/stis a)pole/sas kako\n le/xos
a)nalabei=n qe/leis, qeou= soi th\n tu/xhn dido/ntos eu)=.
filo/gamoi mnhsth=res — h( de/ g' *)elpi/s, oi)=mai me/n, qeo/s,
ka)ce/pracen au)to\ ma=llon h)\ su\ kai\ to\ so\n sqe/nos —
ou(\s labw\n stra/teue: e(/toimoi d' ei)si\ mwri/a| frenw=n.
ou) ga\r a)su/neton to\ qei=on, a)ll' e)/xei sunie/nai
tou\s kakw=s page/ntas o(/rkous kai\ kathnagkasme/nous.
ta)ma\ d' ou)k a)poktenw= 'gw\ te/kna: kou) to\ so\n me\n eu)=
para\ di/khn e)/stai kaki/sths eu)/nidos timwri/a|,
e)me\ de\ sunth/cousi nu/ktes h(me/rai te dakru/ois,
a)/noma drw=nta kou) di/kaia pai=das ou(\s e)geina/mhn.
tau=ta/ soi braxe/a le/lektai kai\ safh= kai\ r(a/|dia:
ei) de\ mh\ bou/lh| fronei=n eu)=, ta)/m' e)gw\ qh/sw kalw=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: oi(/d' au)= dia/foroi tw=n pa/ros lelegme/nwn
mu/qwn, kalw=s d' e)/xousi, fei/desqai te/knwn.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: ai)ai=, fi/lous a)/r' ou)xi\ kekth/mhn ta/las.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ei) tou\s fi/lous ge mh\ qe/leis a)pollu/nai.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: dei/ceis de\ pou= moi patro\s e)k tau)tou= gegw/s;

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: sunswfronei=n soi bou/lom', a)ll' ou) sunnosei=n.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: e)s koino\n a)lgei=n toi=s fi/loisi xrh\ fi/lous.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: eu)= drw=n paraka/lei m', a)lla\ mh\ lupw=n e)me/.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: ou)k a)/ra dokei= soi ta/de ponei=n su\n *(ella/di;

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: *(ella\s de\ su\n soi\ kata\ qeo\n nosei= tina.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: skh/ptrw| nun au)/xei, so\n kasi/gnhton prodou/s.
e)gw\ d' e)p' a)/llas ei)=mi mhxana/s tinas

sp.speaker: *aggelos *a
sp.l: *)aga/memnon, h(/kw pai=da/ soi th\n sh\n a)/gwn,
kai\ pai=s *)ore/sths, w(/s ti terfqei/hs i)dw/n,
a)ll' w(s makra\n e)/teinon, eu)/ruton para\
au)tai/ te pw=loi/ t': e)s de\ leimw/nwn xlo/hn
e)gw\ de\ pro/dromos sh=s paraskeuh=s xa/rin
h(/kw: pe/pustai ga\r strato/s — taxei=a ga\r
pa=s d' e)s qe/na o(/milos e)/rxetai dro/mw|,
sh\n pai=d' o(/pws i)/dwsin: oi( d' eu)dai/mones
e)n pa=si kleinoi\ kai\ peri/bleptoi brotoi=s.
le/gousi d': *(ume/naio/s tis h)\ ti/ pra/ssetai;
e)ko/mise pai=da; tw=n d' a)\n h)/kousas ta/de:
a)ll' ei)=a, ta)pi\ toisi/d' e)ca/rxou kana=,
lwto\s boa/sqw kai\ podw=n e)/stw ktu/pos:
fw=s ga\r to/d' h(/kei maka/rion th=| parqe/nw|.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ta\ d' a)/ll' i)ou/shs th=s tu/xhs e)/stai kalw=s.
oi)/moi, ti/ fw= du/sthnos; a)/rcwmai po/qen;
h( dusge/neia d' w(s e)/xei ti xrh/simon.
kai\ ga\r dakru=sai r(a|di/ws au)toi=s e)/xei,
a(/panta/ t' ei)pei=n. tw=| de\ gennai/w| fu/sin
a)/nolba tau=ta. prosta/thn de\ tou= bi/ou
to\n o)/gkon e)/xomen tw=| t' o)/xlw| douleu/omen.
e)gw\ ga\r e)kbalei=n me\n ai)dou=mai da/kru,
to\ mh\ dakru=sai d' au)=qis ai)dou=mai ta/las,
ei)=e(n: ti/ fh/sw pro\s da/marta th\n e)mh/n;
pw=s de/comai/ nin; poi=on o)/mma sumbalw=;
kai\ ga/r m' a)pw/les' e)pi\ kakoi=s a(/ moi pa/ros
e)lqou=s' a)/klhtos. ei)ko/tws d' a(/m' e(/speto
dw/sous', i(/n' h(ma=s o)/ntas eu(rh/sei kakou/s.
th\n d' au)= ta/lainan parqe/non — ti/ parqe/non;
w(s w)/|ktis': oi)=mai ga/r nin i(keteu/sein ta/de:
gh/meias au)to\s xw(/stis e)sti/ soi fi/los.
ou) suneta\ sunetw=s: e)/ti ga/r e)sti nh/pios.
ai)ai=, to\n *(ele/nhs w(/s m' a)pw/lesen ga/mon

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ka)gw\ katw/|ktir', w(s gunai=ka dei= ce/nhn

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: a)delfe/, do/s moi decia=s th=s sh=s qigei=n.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: di/dwmi: so\n ga\r to\ kra/tos, a)/qlios d' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *mene/laos
sp.l: tou= sou= t' e)klh/qh, to\n teko/nta t' *)atre/a,
h)= mh\n e)rei=n soi ta)po\ kardi/as safw=s
kai\ mh\ 'pi/thdes mhde/n, a)ll' o(/son fronw=.
e)gw/ s' a)p' o)/sswn e)kbalo/nt' i)dw\n da/kru
ou)k e)s se\ deino/s: ei)mi\ d' ou(=per ei)= su\ nu=n:
kai/ soi parainw= mh/t' a)poktei/nein te/knon
mh/t' a)nqele/sqai tou)mo/n. ou) ga\r e)/ndikon
se\ me\n stena/zein, ta)ma\ d' h(de/ws e)/xein,
qnh/|skein te tou\s sou/s, tou\s d' e)mou\s o(ra=n fa/os.
ti/ bou/lomai ga/r; ou) ga/mous e)caire/tous
a)/llous la/boim' a)/n, ei) ga/mwn i(mei/romai;
a)ll' a)pole/sas a)delfo/n, o(/n m' h(/kista xrh=n,
a)/frwn ne/os t' h)=, pri\n ta\ pra/gmat' e)ggu/qen
skopw=n e)sei=don oi(=on h)=n ktei/nein te/kna.
a)/llws te/ m' e)/leos th=s talaipw/rou ko/rhs
h(\ tw=n e)mw=n e(/kati qu/esqai ga/mwn
me/llei. ti/ d' *(ele/nhs parqe/nw| th=| sh=| me/ta;
su\ d' o)/mma pau=sai dakru/ois te/ggwn to\ so/n,
ei) de/ ti ko/rhs sh=s qesfa/twn me/testi soi/,
mh\ 'moi\ mete/stw: soi\ ne/mw tou)mo\n me/ros.
a)ll' e)s metabola\s h)=lqon a)po\ deinw=n lo/gwn;
ste/rgwn mete/peson. a)ndro\s ou) kakou= tropai\

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: ai)nw= se, *mene/la', o(/ti para\ gnw/mhn e)mh\n
u(pe/qhkas o)rqw=s tou\s lo/gous sou= t' a)ci/ws.
taraxh\ d' a)delfw=n dia/ t' e)/rwta gi/gnetai

sp.speaker: *presbu/ths

sp.speaker: *klutaimh/stra
sp.l: pai=da/ mou kataktenou=si soi=s dolw/santes ga/mois.

sp.speaker: *)axilleu/s

sp.speaker: *klutaimh/stra
sp.l: ou)k e)paidesqh/somai/ ge prospesei=n to\ so\n go/nu,
qnhto\s e)k qea=s gegw=ta: ti/ ga\r e)gw\ semnu/nomai;
h)\ ti/nos spoudaste/on moi ma=llon h)\ te/knou pe/ri;
a)ll' a)/munon, w)= qea=s pai=, th=| t' e)mh=| duspraci/a|
th=| te lexqei/sh| da/marti sh=| — ma/thn me/n, a)ll' o(/mws.
soi\ kataste/yas' e)gw/ nin h)=gon w(s gamoume/nhn,
nu=n d' e)pi\ sfaga\s komi/zw: soi\ d' o)/neidos i(/cetai,
o(/stis ou)k h)/munas: ei) ga\r mh\ ga/moisin e)zu/ghs,
a)ll' e)klh/qhs gou=n talai/nhs parqe/nou fi/los po/sis.
pro\s geneia/dos <se>, pro/s se decia=s, pro\s mhte/ros —
o)/noma ga\r to\ so/n m' a)pw/les', w(=| s' a)munaqei=n xrew/n —
ou)k e)/xw bwmo\n katafugei=n a)/llon h)\ to\ so\n go/nu:
ou)de\ fi/los ou)dei\s gela=| moi: ta\ d' *)agame/mnonos klu/eis,
w)ma\ kai\ pa/ntolm': a)fi=gmai d', w(/sper ei)sora=|s, gunh\
nautiko\n stra/teum' a)/narxon ka)pi\ toi=s kakoi=s qrasu/ . . .
xrh/simon d', o(/tan qe/lwsin. h)\n de\ tolmh/sh|s su/ mou
xei=r' u(pertei=nai, sesw/|smeq': ei) de\ mh/, ou) sesw/|smeqa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: deino\n to\ ti/ktein kai\ fe/rei fi/ltron me/ga

sp.speaker: *)axilleu/s
sp.l: e)pi/stamai de\ toi=s kakoi=si/ t' a)sxala=n
lelogisme/noi ga\r oi( toioi/d' ei)si\n brotw=n
o)rqw=s diazh=n to\n bi/on gnw/mhs me/ta.
e)/stin me\n ou)=n i(/n' h(du\ mh\ li/an fronei=n,
e)/stin de\ xw(/pou xrh/simon gnw/mhn e)/xein.
e)gw\ d', e)n a)ndro\s eu)sebesta/tou trafei\s
kai\ toi=s *)atrei/dais, h)\n me\n h(gw=ntai kalw=s,
peiso/meq', o(/tan de\ mh\ kalw=s, ou) pei/somai.
a)ll' e)nqa/d' e)n *troi/a| t' e)leuqe/ran fu/sin
pare/xwn, *)/arh to\ kat' e)me\ kosmh/sw dori/.
se\ d', w)= sxe/tlia paqou=sa pro\s tw=n filta/twn,
a(\ dh\ kat' a)/ndra gi/gnetai neani/an,
kou)/pote ko/rh sh\ pro\s patro\s sfagh/setai,
e)mh\ fatisqei=s': ou) ga\r e)mple/kein ploka\s
e)gw\ pare/cw sw=| po/sei tou)mo\n de/mas.
tou)/noma ga/r, ei) kai\ mh\ si/dhron h)/rato,
tou)mo\n foneu/sei pai=da sh/n. to\ d' ai)/tion
po/sis so/s. a(gno\n d' ou)ke/t' e)sti\ sw=m' e)mo/n,
ei) di' e)/m' o)lei=tai dia/ te tou\s e)mou\s ga/mous
h( deina\ tla=sa kou)k a)nekta\ parqe/nos,
e)gw\ to\ mhde/n, *mene/lews d' e)n a)ndra/sin,
ei)/per foneu/ei tou)mo\n o)/noma sw=| po/sei.
ma\ to\n di' u(grw=n kuma/twn teqramme/non
ou)d' ei)s a)/kran xei=r', w(/ste prosbalei=n pe/plois:
pikrou\s de\ proxu/tas xe/rniba/s t' a)na/cetai
*ka/lxas o( ma/ntis. ti/s de\ ma/ntis e)/st' a)nh/r,
o(\s o)li/g' a)lhqh=, polla\ de\ yeudh= le/gei
tuxw/n, o(/tan de\ mh\ tu/xh|, dioi/xetai;
ou) tw=n ga/mwn e(/kati — muri/ai ko/rai
a)ll' u(/brin e)s h(ma=s u(/bris' *)agame/mnwn a)/nac.
xrh=n d' au)to\n ai)tei=n tou)mo\n o)/nom' e)mou= pa/ra,
e)n tw=|d' e)/kamne no/stos: ou)k h)rnou/meq' a)\n
to\ koino\n au)/cein w(=n me/t' e)strateuo/mhn.
nu=n d' ou)de/n ei)mi, para\ de\ toi=s strathla/tais
e)n eu)marei= me dra=n te kai\ mh\ dra=n kakw=s.
ta/x' ei)/setai si/dhros, o(\n pri\n e)s *fru/gas
ei)/ ti/s me th\n sh\n qugate/r' e)cairh/setai.
a)ll' h(su/xaze: qeo\s e)gw\ pe/fhna/ soi
me/gistos, ou)k w)/n: a)ll' o(/mws genh/somai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/lecas, w)= pai= *phle/ws, sou= t' a)/cia
kai\ th=s e)nali/as dai/monos, semnh=s qeou=.

sp.speaker: *klutaimh/stra
sp.l: pw=s a)/n s' e)paine/saimi mh\ li/an lo/gois,
mhd' e)ndeh\s tou=d' a)pole/saimi th\n xa/rin;
ai)nou/menoi ga\r oi( a)gaqoi\ tro/pon tina\
misou=si tou\s ai)nou=ntas, h)\n ai)nw=s' a)/gan.
i)di/a| nosou=sa: su\ d' a)/nosos kakw=n e)mw=n.
a)ll' ou)=n e)/xei toi sxh=ma, ka)\n a)/pwqen h)=|
oi)/ktire d' h(ma=s: oi)ktra\ ga\r pepo/nqamen:
h(\ prw=ta me/n se gambro\n oi)hqei=s' e)/xein,
kenh\n kate/sxon e)lpi/d': ei)=ta/ soi ta/xa
o)/rnis ge/noit' a)\n toi=si me/llousin ga/mois
qanou=s' e)mh\ pai=s, o(/ se fula/casqai xrew/n.
a)ll' eu)= me\n a)rxa\s ei)=pas, eu)= de\ kai\ te/lh:
sou= ga\r qe/lontos pai=s e)mh\ swqh/setai.
bou/lh| nin i(ke/tin so\n periptu/cai go/nu;
a)parqe/neuta me\n ta/d': ei) de/ soi dokei=,
h(/cei, di' ai)dou=s o)/mm' e)/xous' e)leu/qeron.
ei) d' ou) parou/shs tau)ta\ teu/comai se/qen,
mene/tw kat' oi)/kous: semna\ ga\r semnu/netai.
o(/mws d' o(/son ge dunato\n ai)dei=sqai xrew/n.

sp.speaker: *)axilleu/s
sp.l: su\ mh/te sh\n pai=d' e)/cag' o)/yin ei)s e)mh/n,

strato\s ga\r a)qro/os, a)rgo\s w)\n tw=n oi)/koqen,

qa/noimi: mh\ qa/noimi d', h)\n sw/|sw ko/rhn.

sp.speaker: *klutaimh/stra
sp.l: a)/koue dh/ nun: a)nakalu/yw ga\r lo/gous,
prw=ton me/n, i(/na soi prw=ta tou=t' o)neidi/sw,
bre/fos te tou)mo\n sw=| prosou/disas pa/lw|,

to/nd', w(=n mia=s su\ tlhmo/nws m' a)posterei=s.

le/con, ti/ fh/seis; h)\ 'me\ xrh\ le/gein ta\ sa/;

mh\ dh=ta pro\s qew=n mh/t' a)nagka/sh|s e)me\
kakh\n gene/sqai peri\ se/, mh/t' au)to\s ge/nh|.
qu/seis † de\ pai=d', e)/nqa † ti/nas eu)xa\s e)rei=s;
ti/ soi kateu/ch| ta)gaqo/n, sfa/zwn te/knon;
no/ston ponhro/n, oi)/koqe/n g' ai)sxrw=s i)w/n;
a)ll' e)me\ di/kaion a)gaqo\n eu)/xesqai/ ti/ soi;
ou)/ ta)/r' a)sune/tous tou\s qeou\s h(goi/meq' a)/n,
h(/kwn d' a)\n *)/argos prospe/sois te/knoisi soi=s;
a)ll' ou) qe/mis soi. ti/s de\ kai\ prosble/yetai
pai/dwn s', i(/n' au)tw=n prose/menos kta/nh|s tina/;

o(\n xrh=n di/kaion lo/gon e)n *)argei/ois le/gein:
klh=ron ti/qesqe pai=d' o(/tou qanei=n xrew/n.
e)n i)/sw| ga\r h)=n to/d', a)lla\ mh\ se\ e)cai/reton
ou(=per to\ pra=gm' h)=n. nu=n d' e)gw\ me\n h( to\ so\n
tou/twn a)/meiyai/ m' ei)/ ti mh\ kalw=s le/gw:
ei) d' eu)= le/lektai, † nw=i mh\ dh/ ge kta/nh|s †
th\n sh/n te ka)mh\n pai=da, kai\ sw/frwn e)/sh|.

sp.speaker: *)ifige/neia
sp.l: tw=n e)mw=n lo/gwn: ma/thn ga/r s' ei)sorw= qumoume/nhn
sw=| po/sei: ta\ d' a)du/naq' h(mi=n karterei=n ou) r(a/|dion.
to\n me\n ou)=n ce/non di/kaion ai)ne/sai proqumi/as:
a)lla\ kai\ se\ tou=q' o(ra=n xrh/, mh\ diablhqh=| stratw=|,
kai\ ple/on pra/cwmen ou)de/n, o(/de de\ sumfora=s tu/xh|.
oi(=a d' ei)sh=lqe/n m', a)/kouson, mh=ter, e)nnooume/nhn:
katqanei=n me/n moi de/doktai: tou=to d' au)to\ bou/lomai
eu)klew=s pra=cai, parei=sa/ g' e)kpodw\n to\ dusgene/s.
deu=ro dh\ ske/yai meq' h(mw=n, mh=ter, w(s kalw=s le/gw:
ei)s e)/m' *(ella\s h( megi/sth pa=sa nu=n a)poble/pei,
ka)n e)moi\ porqmo/s te naw=n kai\ *frugw=n kataskafai\
ta/s te mellou/sas gunai=kas, h)/n ti drw=si ba/rbaroi,
mhke/q' a(rpa/zein e)a=n tou/sd' o)lbi/as e)c *(ella/dos,
tau=ta pa/nta katqanou=sa r(u/somai, kai/ mou kle/os,
kai\ ga\r ou)de/ toi/ ti li/an e)me\ filoyuxei=n xrew/n:
pa=si ga/r m' *(/ellhsi koino\n e)/tekes, ou)xi\ soi\ mo/nh|.
a)lla\ muri/oi me\n a)/ndres a)spi/sin pefragme/noi,
muri/oi d' e)re/tm' e)/xontes, patri/dos h)dikhme/nhs,
dra=n ti tolmh/sousin e)xqrou\s xu(pe\r *(ella/dos qanei=n,
h( d' e)mh\ yuxh\ mi/' ou)=sa pa/nta kwlu/sei ta/de;
ti/ to\ di/kaion tou=to/ ge; a)=r' e)/xoim' a)\n a)nteipei=n e)/pos;
ka)p' e)kei=n' e)/lqwmen: ou) dei= to/nde dia\ ma/xhs molei=n
ei(=s g' a)nh\r krei/sswn gunaikw=n muri/wn o(ra=n fa/os.
ei) bebou/lhtai de\ sw=ma tou)mo\n *)/artemis labei=n,
e)mpodw\n genh/somai 'gw\ qnhto\s ou)=sa th=| qew=|;
qu/et', e)kporqei=te *troi/an. tau=ta ga\r mnhmei=a/ mou
dia\ makrou=, kai\ pai=des ou(=toi kai\ ga/moi kai\ do/c' e)mh/.
barba/rwn d' *(/ellhnas a)/rxein ei)ko/s, a)ll' ou) barba/rous,
mh=ter, *(ellh/nwn: to\ me\n ga\r dou=lon, oi(\ d' e)leu/qeroi.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: to\ me\n so/n, w)= nea=ni, gennai/ws e)/xei:
to\ th=s tu/xhs de\ kai\ to\ th=s qeou= nosei=.

sp.speaker: *)axilleu/s
sp.l: e)/melle qh/sein, ei) tu/xoimi sw=n ga/mwn.
zhlw= de\ sou= me\n *(ella/d', *(ella/dos de\ se/.
eu)= ga\r to/d' ei)=pas a)ci/ws te patri/dos:
to\ qeomaxei=n ga\r a)polipou=s', o(/ sou kratei=,
ma=llon de\ le/ktrwn sw=n po/qos m' e)se/rxetai
e)s th\n fu/sin ble/yanta: gennai/a ga\r ei)=.
o(/ra d': e)gw\ ga\r bou/lomai/ s' eu)ergetei=n
labei=n t' e)s oi)/kous: a)/xqomai/ t', i)/stw *qe/tis,
ei) mh/ se sw/sw *danai/+daisi dia\ ma/xhs
e)lqw/n. a)/qrhson: o( qa/natos deino\n kako/n.

sp.speaker: *)ifige/neia
sp.l: h( *tundari\s pai=s dia\ to\ sw=m' a)rkei= ma/xas
a)ndrw=n tiqei=sa kai\ fo/nous: su\ d', w)= ce/ne,
mh\ qnh=|ske di' e)me\ mhd' a)poktei/nh|s tina/,
e)/a de\ sw=|sai/ m' *(ella/d', h)\n dunw/meqa.

sp.speaker: *)axilleu/s
sp.l: w)= lh=m' a)/riston, ou)k e)/xw pro\s tou=t' e)/ti
le/gein, e)pei/ soi ta/de dokei=: gennai=a ga\r
fronei=s: ti/ ga\r ta)lhqe\s ou)k ei)/poi tis a)/n;
o(/mws d', i)/sws ga\r ka)\n metagnoi/hs ta/de,
[w(s ou)=n a)\n ei)dh=|s ta)p' e)mou= lelegme/na,]
e)lqw\n ta/d' o(/pla qh/somai bwmou= pe/las,
w(s ou)k e)a/swn s' a)lla\ kwlu/swn qanei=n.
xrh/sh| de\ kai\ su\ toi=s e)moi=s lo/gois ta/xa,
o(/tan pe/las sh=s fa/sganon de/rhs i)/dh|s.
ou)/koun e)a/sw s' a)frosu/nh| th=| sh=| qanei=n:

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: a)ll', w)= fi/lh de/spoina, pa=n peu/sh| safw=s.
le/cw d' a)p' a)rxh=s, h)/n ti mh\ sfalei=sa/ mou
gnw/mh tara/ch| glw=ssan e)n lo/gois e)mh/n.
e)pi\ sfaga\s stei/xousan ei)s a)/lsos ko/rhn,
h(\ de\ staqei=sa tw=| teko/nti plhsi/on
tou)mo\n de\ sw=ma th=s e)mh=s u(pe\r pa/tras
qu=sai di/dwm' e(kou=sa pro\s bwmo\n qea=s
kai\ tou)p' e)/m' eu)tuxei=te: kai\ nikhfo/rou
dw/rou tu/xoite patri/da t' e)ci/koisqe gh=n.
pro\s tau=ta mh\ yau/sh| tis *)argei/wn e)mou=:
tosau=t' e)/lece: pa=s d' e)qa/mbhsen klu/wn
sta\s d' e)n me/sw| *talqu/bios, w(=| to/d' h)=n me/lon,
*ka/lxas d' o( ma/ntis e)s kanou=n xrush/laton
kolew=n e)/swqen, kra=ta/ t' e)/steyen ko/rhs.
o( pai=s d' o( *phle/ws e)n ku/klw| bwmo\n qea=s
labw\n kanou=n e)/brece xe/rniba/s q' o(mou=,
to\ lampro\n ei(li/ssous' e)n eu)fro/nh| fa/os,
de/cai to\ qu=ma to/d' o(/ ge/ soi dwrou/meqa
kai\ do\s gene/sqai plou=n new=n a)ph/mona
e)s gh=n d' *)atrei=dai pa=s strato/s t' e)/sth ble/pwn.
laimo/n t' e)peskopei=q', i(/na plh/ceien a)/n:
e)moi\ de/ t' a)/lgos ou) mikro\n ei)sh/|ei freni/,
ka)/sthn neneukw/s: qau=ma d' h)=n ai)/fnhs o(ra=n.
plhgh=s ktu/pon ga\r pa=s tis h)/|sqet' a)\n safw=s,
th\n parqe/non d' ou)k ei)=den ou(= gh=s ei)se/du.
boa=| d' i(ereu/s, a(/pas d' e)ph/xhse strato/s,
fa/sm', ou(= ge mhd' o(rwme/nou pi/stis parh=n:
e)/lafos ga\r a)spai/rous' e)/keit' e)pi\ xqoni\
i)dei=n megi/sth diapreph/s te th\n qe/an,
h(=s ai(/mati bwmo\s e)rai/net' a)/rdhn th=s qeou=.
ka)n tw=|de *ka/lxas pw=s dokei=s xai/rwn e)/fh:
o(ra=te th/nde qusi/an, h(\n h( qeo\s
w(s mh\ mia/nh| bwmo\n eu)genei= fo/nw|.
h(de/ws te tou=t' e)de/cato, kai\ plou=n ou)/rion
pro\s tau=ta pa=s tis qa/rsos ai)=re nauba/ths,
xw/rei te pro\s nau=n: w(s h(me/ra| th=|de dei=
ta\ pro/sfor' hu)/caq', w(s tu/xoi no/stou strato/s.
pe/mpei d' *)agame/mnwn m' w(/ste soi fra/sai ta/de,
le/gein q' o(poi/as e)k qew=n moi/ras kurei=
e)gw\ parw\n de\ kai\ to\ pra=gm' o(rw=n le/gw:
h( pai=s safw=s soi pro\s qeou\s a)fi/ptato.
lu/phs d' a)fai/rei kai\ po/sei pa/res xo/lon:
a)prosdo/khta de\ brotoi=s ta\ tw=n qew=n,
sw/zousi/ q' ou(\s filou=sin. h)=mar ga\r to/de
qanou=san ei)=de kai\ ble/pousan pai=da sh/n.

sp.speaker: *)agame/mnwn
sp.l: gu/nai, qugatro\s e(/nek' o)/lbioi genoi/meq' a)/n:
e)/xei ga\r o)/ntws e)n qeoi=s o(mili/an.
xrh\ de/ se labou=san to/nde mo/sxon neagenh=
stei/xein pro\s oi)/kous: w(s strato\s pro\s plou=n o(ra=|.
kai\ xai=re: xro/nia ge ta)ma/ soi prosfqe/gmata
